articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Juventus 15-point penalty suspended pending new trial - ESPN India
articles.description: Juventus had a 15-point penalty suspended Thursday, lifting the storied Italian team up to third in Serie A, pending a new trial.
articles.content:
Juventus had a 15-point penalty suspended Thursday, lifting the storied Italian team up to third in Serie A and right in the mix for a spot in next season's Champions League.

articles.title: BCCI slaps ₹12 lakh fine on LSG skipper KL Rahul after Lucknow's win over RR - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The BCCI has slapped INR 12 lakh fine on LSG skipper KL Rahul after Lucknow defeated Sanju Samson's RR in IPL 2023.  | Cricket
